item.title: 11 Scenes In Captain America: Brave New World That Were Definitely Reshoots
item.description: Captain America: Brave New World had an extremely tumultuous production, with numerous key scenes being added later with reshoots in post-production.

item.title: 10 Great Star Wars Twists We'll Remember Forever
item.description: The Star Wars movies, TV shows, and video games have some of the most shocking plot twists in science fiction, and 10 are impossible to forget.

item.title: MCU Adamantium vs. Vibranium Explained: 6 Biggest Differences
item.description: Captain America: Brave New World introduces adamantium into the MCU, a new element rivaling Wakanda's vibranium. Here are the biggest differences.
